nio/GPIOWrite.Output:
Each input signal triggers a pin write. The boolean `pin` value is added to the signal.
```
{
'input_attr': 'I was already here',
'value': 'value_property'
}
```
nio/GPIOWrite.Description: Write to the specified gpio pin.

nio/GPIOInterrupt.Output:
Each input signal triggers an interrupt. The `pin` is added to the signal.
```
{
'input_attr': 'I was already here',
'pin': 'pin_property'
}
```
nio/GPIOInterrupt.Description: Notify an interrupt signal when the specified `pin` changes it's `value`.

pin.description: the pin to monitor for interrupts

pull_up_down.description: value of `pin` when it's logic level is neither high nor low

nio/GPIORead.Output:
Each input signal triggers a pin read. The boolean `pin` value is added to the signal.
```
{
'input_attr': 'I was already here',
'value': True
}
```
nio/GPIORead.Description: Read the value of a gpio pin.

pull_up_down.description: value of `pin` when it's logic level is neither high nor low
